summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing an agreement with he Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle providing for joint financing of one-half the cost of a Cedar River Fish Production Study by the University of Washington; increasing the expenditure allowance for Object of Expenditure "4200-Miscellaneous Expenses" in Program Category "Water Resources" (Code 2700) in the 1975 Budget of the Water Department and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Water Fund therefor.
